creator: martin.ginter@uniklinik-freiburg.de
text:
If the defaultfiredocs-publication contains a large site tree the loading-time of  Firedocs is very long - until one minute for a large pub.

Technical problem description from Andreas Hartmann:
"The problem is that Firedocs sends a request for each document in the
site tree (lenya.usecase=atom.entry)"
